name: Federation of European Rice Millers
goal:
• To promote and defend the interests of Europe’s rice milling industry.

•To provide support to the European Institutions in all aspects of policy and legislation that affects the supply, milling, processing, marketing and sale of rice in the European Union.

•To ensure European rice mills can satisfy the varied demands of European consumers for rice of all origins.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Business and Industry, Consumers, Customs, Environment, Food Safety, Single market, Trade
euInitiatives:
International and bilateral trade
Common Agricultural Policy
food safety policy.
Food quality policy
Agricultural promotion
Internal market
competitiveness in the food chain
Environment
